hgr::Lines Class Reference
[Hierarchical graphics library]

#include <Lines.h>

Inheritance diagram for hgr::Lines:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Line list.

Lines can have gradient color and transparency. Lines can define 'paths' which can be used for example to path finding.


Public Member Functions

float  radius,
float  height,
const math::float4 &  color,
int  segments = 12
) 
 

Adds a cylinder to the line list.

Parameters:
tm Cylinder bottom transform

height Cylinder height along positive Z axis
color Color of the lines
segments Number of segments in the cylinder.

void hgr::Lines::addLine (  const math::float3 &  startpoint,
const math::float3 &  endpoint,
const math::float4 &  startcolor,
const math::float4 &  endcolor
) 
 

Adds a gradient line with optional transparency to the line list.

Parameters:
startpoint Start position of the line in model space.
endpoint End position of the line in model space.
startcolor Start color and transparency of the line (R,G,B,A). Opaque white is (1,1,1,1) and black (0,0,0,0).
endcolor End color and transparency of the line (R,G,B,A). Opaque white is (1,1,1,1) and black (0,0,0,0).

void hgr::Lines::addLine (  const math::float3 &  startpoint,
const math::float3 &  endpoint,
const math::float4 &  color
) 
 

Adds a constant color line with optional transparency to the line list.

Line list need to be locked by creating Lock object to scope before calling this method. This method requires that there is space for the line in the line list. You can check if there is space by calling count() and comparing that the return value is below maxCount().

Parameters:
startpoint Start position of the line in model space.
endpoint End position of the line in model space.
color Color and transparency of the line (R,G,B,A). Opaque white is (1,1,1,1) and black (0,0,0,0).

void hgr::Lines::addPath (  int  beginline,
int  endline
) 
 

Adds a 'path' to the line list.

Path consists of sequence of lines, which have been added to the list previously.

Parameters:
beginline The first line which belongs to this path.
beginline One beyond the last line which belongs to this path.

void hgr::Lines::getShaders (  lang::Array< gr::Shader * > &  shaders  )  [virtual]
 

Returns array of shaders used by this visual.

NOTE: Implementation should not clear the list of returned shaders before adding new ones, since shadesr from multiple Visuals might be collected at the same time.

Implements hgr::Visual.
